channel.title: Comments on: Interior Project by Broadfield Customs Part II

item.title: By: Kevin
item.dc:creator: Kevin
item.description: I did a similar thing to my interior bits and used the wrinkle coating by VHT. I was wondering what you used as I like the finish of yours a little bit better.
item.content:encoded: I did a similar thing to my interior bits and used the wrinkle coating by VHT. I was wondering what you used as I like the finish of yours a little bit better.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/08/interior-project-by-broadfield-customs-part-2/#comment-110013">4g63rotary</a>.
Oops! I just realized that a setting was off in my Contact form. Could you please send me your mail again? I didn't get it. eric [at] grandmighty.com
item.content:encoded:
In reply to 4g63rotary.

Oops! I just realized that a setting was off in my Contact form. Could you please send me your mail again? I didn’t get it. eric [at] grandmighty.com

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/08/interior-project-by-broadfield-customs-part-2/#comment-109820">4g63rotary</a>.
Glad you checked back in Wendell. And yep, I abandoned the idea of forums permanently and decided to bring back the blog and overhaul it at the same time.
I actually am going to be selling my glossy interior pieces. If you're interested, shoot me an email through here or send me a PM on RX7Club :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to 4g63rotary.

Glad you checked back in Wendell. And yep, I abandoned the idea of forums permanently and decided to bring back the blog and overhaul it at the same time.

I actually am going to be selling my glossy interior pieces. If you’re interested, shoot me an email through here or send me a PM on RX7Club :)

item.title: By: 4g63rotary
item.dc:creator: 4g63rotary
item.description:
Sup Eric its been a while I see you've updated your site.....again lol! Looking good as usual your FDLSX is also looking amazing man! If you ever plan to sell your glossy interior bits keep me in mind! I finally got the alternator I bought off you installed. My little project is finally coming together. Talk to ya soon man take care!
Wendell -
item.content:encoded:
Sup Eric its been a while I see you’ve updated your site…..again lol!
Looking good as usual your FDLSX is also looking amazing man! If you ever plan to sell your glossy interior bits keep me in mind! I finally got the alternator I bought off you installed. My little project is finally coming together.
Talk to ya soon man take care!

Wendell –
